meanings.definition: relating to the process of extracting metals from ores using high temperatures
meanings.sent1: The pyrometallurgical method involves using extreme heat to extract metals from rocks.
meanings.sent2: Miners employed a pyrometallurgical approach to separate valuable metals from the earth.
meanings.sent3: The pyrometallurgical process turned the dull rocks into shiny, precious metals.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a pyrometallurgical furnace, melting away obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The fiery furnace of pyrometallurgical techniques illuminated the dark mine shaft.

meanings.definition: involving the use of heat to separate metals from their ores
meanings.sent1: The pyrometallurgical method is effective in isolating metals from their natural compounds.
meanings.sent2: Factories utilize pyrometallurgical processes to extract pure metals from raw materials.
meanings.sent3: The pyrometallurgical approach heated things up in the metal extraction industry.
meanings.sent4: His passion for chemistry burned like a pyrometallurgical flame, refining his skills.
meanings.sent5: The intense heat of pyrometallurgical procedures transformed ores into valuable metals.
